Detailed Description

SenStore HDF5 server implementation.

This module implements the SenStore HDF5 database server.

The Database class provides the main database implementation. The <name>Props classes can be used to define new objects that can be stored in the database, using the Database.add<name>() member functions. Objects can be retrieved using the Database.get<name>() member functions.
